short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate to URLs based on shortcuts and keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description for the Keyword Based Navigator Chrome Extension

The Keyword Based Navigator is an innovative Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing efficiency by enabling keyword-based navigation directly from the Chrome omnibox. This tool allows you to set up custom keywords that act as shortcuts to your favorite websites, streamlining how you access information online.

Example keywords.json:

{
  "keyword": {
    "Name": "Title Of Keyword",
    "URL": "https://test.com/em_alert.do?sysparm_query=number=%s"
  },
  "keyword2": {
    "Name": "Another Keyword Title",
    "URL": "https://example.com/search?query=%s"
  }
}

Keywords.json
{
    "g": {
        "Name": "Google Search",
        "URL": "https://www.google.com/search?q=%s"
    },
    "b": {
        "Name": "Bing Search",
        "URL": "https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s"
    }
}

In the address bar, type
p<space>keyword<space>value
To perform a google search based on json keyword:
p g monkey

Core Features:

- Keyword-Based Navigation: Simplify your web browsing by assigning keywords to URLs. Enter a keyword into the Chrome omnibox followed by a specific query to quickly navigate to the linked site.

- Omnibox Integration: Fully integrates with the Chrome address bar, utilizing it as the command line for entering keywords and search terms, merging seamlessly with your browsing habits.

- Dynamic Keyword Management: Easily add, modify, or remove keywords through a user-friendly options page. This feature supports dynamic updates to your keyword list without needing to restart the browser or reload the extension.

- JSON Configuration Support: Import and export your keyword configurations via JSON files. This functionality allows for backup, recovery, and sharing of settings between different devices or with other users.

- Efficient URL Management: Organize and maintain your URLs associated with keywords through the extensionâ€™s intuitive management interface, ensuring your navigational shortcuts are always up to date.

Ideal for:

- Power Users: Those who love efficiency and want to reduce the time spent typing long URLs or navigating through bookmarks.
- Professionals: Enhance productivity by quickly accessing frequently used business tools and platforms.
- Students and Researchers: Easily switch between educational resources and research sites.
- Everyday Browsing: Streamline access to daily news sites, social media, and more with simple keywords.

Getting Started:

1. Install the Extension: Add Keyword Based Navigator to Chrome from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Configure Keywords: Use the options page to assign keywords to your favorite URLs.
3. Navigate Efficiently: Start using the omnibox to navigate faster than ever before.

Why Choose Keyword Based Navigator?

Keyword Based Navigator is not just a tool; it's a workflow enhancer for anyone who spends significant time online. It reduces the cognitive load and physical effort needed to access information, making browsing not only faster but also more enjoyable.

Transform your Chrome omnibox into a powerful command tool with Keyword Based Navigator, and experience a smarter way to browse the web.
